description: Those unrefined gemstones can finaly get polished up!

/b/Unrefined Gems/b/ need to be /6/washed/6/ via an /b/Ecased Fan/b/ through /b/Water/b/. Next, /6/cut them/6/ to shape on a /b/Mechanical Saw/b/, and finally /6/polish/6/ them on a /b/Belt Grinder/b/. Handheld sandpaper wont cut it.
The Belt Grinder must be /c/powered above a set RPM/c/ aganist the flow of items depending on the recipe and then be /6/passed items over/6/ it similar to the saw.
This will allow you to refine /b/Diamonds/b/.
